title: New book from Roberto de Vicq de Cumptich
content:
If you saw and loved his [Bembo’s Zoo](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143035/http:/www.bemboszoo.com/), you will probably like [_Men of Letters and People of Substance_](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143035/http:/godine.com/isbn.asp?isbn=1567923380), to be published this coming October 31 by David R. Godine.

See also: [http://www.typophile.com/node/8901](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/8901 "http://www.typophile.com/node/8901")

 [‹ Si caught with his pants down while Redsox wait for Rocky Mountain high!](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38372 "Go to previous forum topic") [What's on your word processor for everyday use? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38330 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ricardo Cordoba

comments.content: Thanks for pointing this out, Ricardo. I was always disappointed that I never got to see his book _Words at Play_, so I’m eager to take a look at this one.

Reed, I believe that you can order _Words At Play_ from [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143035/http:/www.wordsatplay.com/getbook.html). I can’t be sure if they still have copies, but do give it a try. :-)
It’s a good thing I can get more reading done at my new gym, or I would never have time to keep up with all the great type books coming out.
I was under the impression that they had sold out, but having never seen the actual ordering page, I’m giving it a try. Maybe in “2 to 3 weeks” I’ll have a copy of my own! Thanks again.

Reed said... _Thanks again._

You’re welcome! _Words at Play_ is worth getting.

James said... _It’s a good thing I can get more reading done at my new gym..._

But watch out for drops of sweat falling on the pages of those expensive type books!
